name: TiffSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options for saving a document in TIFF format.

property.name: alphaChannels
property.shortdesc: If true, the alpha channels are saved.

property.name: layers
property.shortdesc: If true, the layers are saved.

property.name: annotations
property.shortdesc: If true, the annotations are saved.

property.name: spotColors
property.shortdesc: If true, spot colors are saved.

property.name: embedColorProfile
property.shortdesc: If true, the color profile is embedded in the document.

property.name: jpegQuality
property.shortdesc: The quality of the produced image, which is inversely proportionate to the amount of JPEG compression. Valid only for JPEG compressed TIFF documents. Range: 0 to 12.

property.name: byteOrder
property.shortdesc: The order in which the bytes will be read. Default: Mac OS when running in Mac OS, and IBM PC when running in Windows.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: If true, saves the transparency as an additional alpha channel when the file is opened in another application.

property.name: layerCompression
property.shortdesc: The method of compression to use when saving layers (as opposed to saving composite data). Valid only when 'layers' = true.

property.name: interleaveChannels
property.shortdesc: If true, the channels in the image are interleaved.
